heading: Coffee Byproducts
description: We discovered unique microorganisms in the coffee fruit that enhance bioactive compounds and have a powerful effect on plant metabolism & growth regulation.

heading: Patented Process
description: We developed a process to capture discarded pulp & mucilage in the coffee milling process as a foundation for our natural biofertilizer.

heading: Unparalleled Results
description: Our biofertilizer improves stress adaptation and enhances both crop yield and quality while reducing chemical fertilizer inputs.
